articles.description: Investing is a learning process, and THIS stock market has taught investors plenty of lessons. The long-awaited game-changer in the form of a vaccine is here as the Dow Industrials, Dow Transports and Russell also break to new highs.
articles.content:
"The fear, not the disease, threatened to break the society apart." - John M. Barry, The Great Influenza: The Story of the Deadliest Pandemic in History
Investors go through the learning process eve… [+27730 chars]
